product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter On Board Toiletry Kit
long_description: Super lightweight at only 5.5 oz., the Eagle Creek Pack-It? Specter On Board Toiletry Kit offers multiple pockets, light padding and a hanging hook for your travel convenience. Made of ultralight silnylon ripstop (silicone-impregnated nylon) that resists water, staining and tearing. Lightly padded with perforated EVA foam to protect contents. Translucent fabric on interior pockets allows some visibility for quick identification of items. Stow-away, swiveling non-slip hook can hang on a door knob or towel rack. 2-way zipper into main compartment; 7 interior slip-in pockets and 2 zip pockets keep everything organized. Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter On Board Toiletry Kit offers a convenient carry handle and is washable.
short_description: Super lightweight at only 5.5 oz., the Eagle Creek Pack-It? Specter On Board Toiletry Kit offers multiple pockets, light padding and a hanging hook for your travel convenience.
